previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. D.C. United | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 4, DC United 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: One of the highest profile matchups on the Major League Soccer calendar is ahead when the LA Galaxy play host to D.C. United on Wednesday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: LA Galaxy vs DC United | August 27, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: I think #DCU just gave Landon Donovan the contents of Frankie Hejduk's pick-up as a gift. #MLS #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, D.C. United 0. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Alan Gordon finds the loose ball and finishes a slick team move

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Fantastic LA attack nearly finished by Alan Gordon

timelineItems.name: Jonathon Podcast
timelineItems.text: Have I mentioned the service to EJ as a problem? #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Welcome back to the #LAGalaxy, Alan Gordon. #LAvDC http://t.co/WhifRR1ePQ

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Leonardo v. EJ in a foot race. Please God no, anything but that. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Lot’s of shiny kicks out on the field tonight. Did someone get a shoe shipment in today? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Juninho with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Aili
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #love #soccer #life

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Just wide from Gordon! Alan Gordon is doing his best Robbie Keane impression in the opening 10 minutes here. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).
Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Bobby Boswell (D.C. United).
Jaime Penedo (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, LA Galaxy. Jaime Penedo tries a through ball, but Alan Gordon is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: Man #DCU's turning it over an awful lot like they did during that mini losing streak vs Hou & RSL.....

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena always wears the same face. This could be a happy Bruce, a sad Bruce or a mad Bruce. #LAGalaxy http://t.co/bcbkJ44svM

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: DC looks to be playing the same plan they did against Sporting. Stay organized and attack quickly on the counter. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Birnbaum sounds even more like Bird Bomb when the LA broadcast guy says it. In case anyone was wondering. #DCU -L

timelineItems.name: adam ramirez
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy game... That is for the tickets babe... @ravengrl52 #lagalaxy #mlssoccer #mybirthdaygame

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Lump the ball to EJ isn't working too well yet #dcuafterdark #dcu #mls

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Silva with white shoes tonight. Normally goes with all black. Might want to change them at halftime. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Louie M
timelineItems.text: is the #9 curse over ? #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Luis Silva (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.desc: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Landon Donovan flies in late from behind

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzalez dribbles out of the back too much. It’s going to cost us. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Brad Saiki
timelineItems.text: Can confirm that Alan Gordon has cute kids. #LAGalaxy http://t.co/5fW89tUGyu

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: LA getting to play the game they'd prefer. Stretching out to both sidelines, everyone on both teams has space to play. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Marcus Ades
timelineItems.text: Why did we not start Espindala with all the space on this big field. I would love to see him work is magic. #DCU #DCUTalk

timelineItems.name: Mariel
timelineItems.text: Not a fan of midweek games but it's @lagalaxy vs. DC United and I'll always have a soft spot for DC. ❤️ #LAvDC #MLS #LAGalaxy #LA #DCUnited #soccer

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).
David Estrada (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Huge point-blank stop by Bill Hamid on Gyasi Zardes

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Payne
timelineItems.text: Steven Birnbaum gets up with authority, you'd hardly know he was a rookie. #DCU #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Donovan with a David Beckham tribute tackle there. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Michael Lacheney
timelineItems.text: No offense to Bobby Boswell, but we've eaten him alive for years now. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 2' #LAGALAXY GOAL! ALAN GORDON with the finish after the bouncing ball falls to him perfectly.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - DC have scored just one first half goal in their last 7 #MLS meetings with LA Galaxy. Lethargic. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: I suspected that #DCU might be giving Donovan a chair. Spotted this last week outside the media room at RFK: http://t.co/hGYpNbiV1z

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Bill Hamid goes ahead and gets his weekly "save of the week" submission out of the way in the first 20 minutes. #DCU #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Luis Silva (D.C. United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Luis Silva with a bad tackle from behind

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Taylor Kemp.
Match ends, LA Galaxy 4, D.C. United 1.

timelineItems.name: Lindsey So
timelineItems.text:
First live soccer game ever. Great seats thanks to the awesome 😘 @alyxmm !!! #lagalaxy

#gogalaxy #ilovesoccer #la @ohlouielouie_r @sahmooel @richard_says

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: And LA wins 3 in the row in league play for the first time this season, pulling within two points of Seattle. #LAvDC http://t.co/4y0dA7QPL4

timelineItems.desc: One of the highest profile matchups on the Major League Soccer calendar is ahead when the LA Galaxy play host to D.C. United on Wednesday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs D.C. United | August 27, 2014

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: What an idea on that throw in. So close Zardes. I don't even mind that he hasn't been scoring. Very dangerous. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Silva (D.C. United).
Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Dear DCU, good as your defense may be(?), you won’t win playing like this. You won’t even tie. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Cloud Dee
timelineItems.text: OMG Landon Donovan has a booty!! #MLS #LAGalaxy #Donovan #10

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Silva, frustrated at being dispossessed made a clumsy challenge. An argument could be made for reckless endangerment #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy).
Bill Hamid (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kim Kolb
timelineItems.text: I think it's safe to say that #DCU's midfield with Caskey and Neal doesn't work as well as with DeLeon and Arnaud

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 22' Alan Gordon with some words for Bill Hamid after the two go up for a cross. A warning issued perhaps? #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Perry Kitchen (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Interesting that Donovan has never been sent off in his #MLS career. Just received his 48th yellow card. #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 2, D.C. United 0. Omar Gonzalez (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Omar Gonzalez side volley doubles the LA lead

timelineItems.name: Sarah
timelineItems.text: I do love Gordon's no fear attitude. Hopefully that rubs off on Zardes, who always looks lost. #LAvDC #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Bea A.
timelineItems.text: I still want Alan Gordon to get a haircut! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matthew Eide
timelineItems.text: God. If EJ's in the staring lineup the tactics are TOTALLY different (ie Lump it to EJ). Can we stop that please? #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Taylor Kemp.

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: And that needlessly conceded corner kick has instantly become a goal for Gonzalez. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Gorgeous shot. Number 2 for #LAGalaxy in the 25th Minute! @Omar4Gonzalez nets it in there (and I got a shot of that too...) #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Der Kommisar
timelineItems.text: I still feel like this is Eddie Johnson's fault somehow. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martonik
timelineItems.text: Would've really liked a tie here, but doesn't look like that's happening. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzalez opting to score with his foot. Still not letting the ball touch the pitch. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Scott Brewer
timelineItems.text: Zardes hasn't scored, but man has he looked sharp. This @LAGalaxy team is a blast to watch. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Shaun Gray
timelineItems.text: At the #LAGalaxy game wit da boys! #goodtimes #cantbelieveImhere #lovinit #freetickets

timelineItems.name: Steven Goff
timelineItems.text: For those watching at home, this is not a #DCU vs. #RSL replay. But it sure looks like it.

timelineItems.name: Der Kommisar
timelineItems.text: Can I blame this on Eddie Johnson? #DCU

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Gordon's nutmeg pass to Sarvas was waaaay sweeter than the goal. Such an underrated passer. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: AJ
timelineItems.text: #lagalaxy game with @jreddy89  @rachelliy and @bucksc even tho you're in a different section! @lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Djo Ntumba
timelineItems.text: Aaaaaaand that's the Bobby Boswell NO ONE wanted to see. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Alan Gordon needed just 67 seconds to get the #LAGalaxy on the board tonight. http://t.co/sn1ZsmFJIO #LAvDC http://t.co/KVrj1XQ0kI

timelineItems.name: Katie Maines
timelineItems.text: I believe that we will win... #LAGalaxy game! @meybrown @brownwc0 @jeremymaines @emvdavis

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: That's 3 goals for Omar Gonzalez in like 4 games. If not 4, then 5. Either way, excellent form. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: #DCU should just start the backups when on road vs WC teams like it's the Open Cup. Can't look much worse.

timelineItems.name: World Football Clothing
timelineItems.text: The twilight's last gleaming. #whereisfootball #lagalaxy #dcunited #football #soccer #futbol

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Apparently Omar thinks he’s a striker. He’s tasted the sweet, sweet honey of scoring with his foot and he wants another. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: #DCU + EJ - Rolfe/Espindola = Tough to watch. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy fans applauding the team's ball movement during this game. They're just spraying the ball around the field right now. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: jcrocker12
timelineItems.text:
Took me a couple of tries! Finally got a goal. @lagalaxy is running circles around #DCUnited! | #LAL 2-0 #DCU 
#ThanksLD

timelineItems.comment: Alex Caskey (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @LARiotSquad seem to be booing @eddie_johnson7 each time he touches the ball. Getting kinda loud. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luis Silva (D.C. United) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Bobby Boswell with a cross.
Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: lutigram
timelineItems.text: Thanks @lisambregman !!! 🙌⚽️ #LAgalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Juninho (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dwyer
timelineItems.text: Crowd seems to have filled in. Looks better than a typical mid-week game at RBA. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leonardo.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Gyasi Zardes denied by Bill Hamid once more

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 36' Juninho getting some treatment after going down. Robbie Rogers and Rafael Garcia are getting up along the sidelines. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Great block by LD. He might know a little something about Franklin's crosses that helped there. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Luis Silva (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: wнerescastalძo
timelineItems.text: Cue Benny Hill #lagalaxy #matchday #thanksLD #dcunited

timelineItems.name: AndrewWilson
timelineItems.text: Someone call #Roswell. One of their residents has escaped. #lagalaxy #cozmo

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Boswell (D.C. United).
Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Wait, was that goal also part of Donovan's retirement gift? How generous. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Claudia💋
timelineItems.text: Woohoo! 1-0 #go #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Kenner Brent
timelineItems.text: #DCU ugh. Boswell turnover= LA Goal. This is going to be a long night with three winners in the midfield.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Sokol
timelineItems.text: Acb!! #lagalaxy #ACB121

timelineItems.name: Patrick Sokol
timelineItems.text: Fieldside #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Kenner Brent
timelineItems.text: #DCU Neal with about his 5th unforced error there

timelineItems.name: Matthew Gluth
timelineItems.text: EJ refuses to play forward. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Chris Webb
timelineItems.text: what a terrible pass from Caskey, underscoring their lack of focus tonight #unitedmania #dcu

timelineItems.name: Ted Meyer
timelineItems.text: Neal is having an AWFUL first half #DCU 2 bad giveaways

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: For emphasis, again: #DCU is not coming back here as long LA is allowed to use the full width of this surface.

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Very difficult to come up with a #DCU player that is doing even just OK. Hamid's kick save is about as good as it gets.

timelineItems.name: Fanpics
timelineItems.text: Take a look at Alan Gordon's 2nd minute goal to give #LAGalaxy the early lead!

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 3, D.C. United 0. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by A.J. DeLaGarza with a cross.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Baggio Husidic finishes off a beautiful Galaxy attack

timelineItems.name: Chris Webb
timelineItems.text: Do you spend a lot of energy (i.e, subs) in trying to come back in 2nd half or do you fall on sword for Sunday? #unitedmania #dcu

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: The Galaxy doing this without Keane is scary. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: With Caskey delivering some forgettable performances, I wonder if Kyle Porter will get back in the rotation down the stretch. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tic. Tac. Goal. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: What fantastic build up play from LA. Super soccer. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Lewis Neal (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: The Galaxy are just playing a cut above everyone else in MLS right now. Different gear. And without Keane, to boot. Scary. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: That sound you heard is thousands of TV sets going off at once on the East Coast. Good night D.C. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Olsen has got to get this sorted at half. Great build up from the Galaxy but the DC players are nearly running around aimlessly. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, LA Galaxy 3, D.C. United 0.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT and the #LAGalaxy are cruising. http://t.co/xxPaGXXdak #LAvDC http://t.co/OwVwhJTjY1

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Looking for a silver lining: #DCU has only played 2 truly bad games in a row once this year (Houston & RSL).

timelineItems.name: Galaxy Star Squad
timelineItems.text: What a half!! The #LAGalaxy lead 3-0! Let's keep this up, boys! #LAvDC http://t.co/FdTI3LgS43

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Penedo's heat map from the first half of #LAvDC: http://t.co/ClvyKN7EpR

timelineItems.name: Bob
timelineItems.text: Well what we need to do is get Perry and Silva off and let the rest manage the game #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ella Rivera 🌻
timelineItems.text: YAAAS. #lagalaxy #wednesdaynights #soccer #la

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text:
GOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLL BAGGIO HUSIDIC! 3-0! 
That was absolutely beautiful. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Fact: Omar Gonzalez can, in fact, score with his feet. http://t.co/5yWDwpGbCD #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Krystal Flores
timelineItems.text: #cozmo #mascot #lagalaxy #suchadork #lol

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Rosano
timelineItems.text: On second count, that's a 26-pass sequence leading to Baggio Husidic's goal for the Galaxy. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Steven Garcia
timelineItems.text:
Midweek match. Great first half 👌
#LAvDC #lagalaxy #mls #galaxy

timelineItems.name: Kenner Brent
timelineItems.text: #DCU Not all the DC players have been bad tonight...just the ones in black shirts

timelineItems.name: soccrgrl2410
timelineItems.text: Donovan with the assist! 3-0 Galaxy at the half! #LAvDC #ThanksLD #LAGFanPics

timelineItems.name: Josh Weber
timelineItems.text: LEWIS NEAL probably just played the worst half I've ever seen him play. Let's get Jeffrey some minutes for him early in this half #DCU

timelineItems.name: Jamie Pham
timelineItems.text: #hyperlapse app at the #LAGalaxy game. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins LA Galaxy 3, D.C. United 0.

timelineItems.name: David
timelineItems.text: #la #galaxy #lagalaxy #gameday #mls

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Tiki-taco on full display tonight. #lagalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Eide
timelineItems.text: We now return to your regularly scheduled #LAG possession drills. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: One other frustrating thing here: #DCU has done nothing to expose Leonardo for being Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Donovan now has double-digit assists for the 7th time in his career. Only Preki (8) has more. #MildlyInteresting #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: 2nd half thought: Compare Zardes/Gordon movement on/off the ball vs Silva/EJ. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What a moment. @Omar4Gonzalez scores and reveals his #LucaKnowsHeart shirt. Watch: http://t.co/LmqA4bwQKM #LAvDC http://t.co/2Is6kfo62V

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I’ll be honest, the @LAGalaxy are looking for AJ to score tonight. I think we’re all hoping to see it. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Foul by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).
Alex Caskey (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: If you missed the 1st half, you missed one of the best build ups to a goal in 2014. And it gave LA a 3-0 lead. http://t.co/lfP5SPPUNh #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: J. Gause
timelineItems.text: What is going on? #Dcunited is playing with no focus or intensity! I'm annoyed...#LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Chris Webb
timelineItems.text: Excuses being what they are one thing is clear, United is only about 14-15 players deep. #unitedmania #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ro
timelineItems.text: Eddie Johnson is the worst DP player in the MLS. What was DC United thinking... #dcvla #DCU

timelineItems.name: ozitnas_evets
timelineItems.text: #frontrow #omargonzales #lagalaxy #hardworkpaysoff #token #appreciation #fordad #instadaily #futbol #soccer #mls #soccerislife #lifeisgood

timelineItems.name: Giovanny  Rojas
timelineItems.text: Missed a few games but I'm back... Let's go Galaxy!!!! #la #lagalaxy #lavadc #mls

timelineItems.name: Kerry Hess
timelineItems.text: Gots to love me some Caskey in the starting XI..... sigh.... #DCU

timelineItems.text: #LaGalaxy! With my dad!

timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy vs DC United #gametime #lagalaxy http://t.co/ilTSR6kHDu

timelineItems.name: david ledesma soto
timelineItems.text: First time being up here #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: thedahliascene
timelineItems.text: So glad to see @s_franklin5 again. Go galaxy of course, but I just wanna say #bringfranklinhome #lagalaxy #dcunited

timelineItems.name: Chris Teale
timelineItems.text: Can't say I blame Ben Olsen for shuffling his deck tonight. This has been an intense stretch of games recently. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I’m going to say this right now… traffic is bad. People will get here late. That’s how these things work. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 10 minutes to first kick. #LAvDC #LucaKnowsHeart http://t.co/TlYIlvTvVV

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Contemplating benching Rolfe and Keane entirely this week in @MLSFantasy. #LAvDC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Tucker Warner
timelineItems.text: Getting ready for #LAvDC. Love watching Donovan wow me.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Focused on the task at hand. #LAvDC #LucaKnowsHeart

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Could definitely see Bruce Arena resting Donovan vs Chivas. That would surely piss off a lot of @MLSFantasy owners. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: HoyDeportes
timelineItems.text: Ya estamos en el partido @LAGalaxy vs @dcunited … ¿Quién nos acompaña? #MiercolesDe #Fútbol #LaGalaxy http://t.co/QfRttKfjIH

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - The Galaxy have not lost at home against DC United in #MLS play since July of 2005, a run of seven games since (3W 4D). Dreaming. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: B.S. (Jr.)
timelineItems.text: Given #DCU lineup on the road, pretty sure 1 point is the target. But who knows, maybe EJ wants to start earning his check. @MLS #DCUTalk

timelineItems.name: Carlos Reyes
timelineItems.text: || no American player has been more influential to the beautiful sport of soccer than #LandonDonovan #10 • thank you • I believe that we will win!!! || #youwishyouwereareyes #pictapgo_app #afterlight #mextures #lagalaxy #LAvsDC #thanksld #mls #humpday #ussoccer #usa #byelandondonovan

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Anthem time. Almost kickoff, are you tuned into CSN? #LAvDC #DCU

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: A special gift from #DCU and @DCSportsEnt! Thanks for the memories, @landondonovan! http://t.co/G1FwGW8q0x http://t.co/OI3VhanE5C

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: LD wearing the captain's arm band tonight. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Sean McPherson
timelineItems.text: Never realized that Omar Gonzalez is a giant. Like an actual giant. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: shahir_amr
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan pinnie makes for a happy nephew @mls @lagalaxy @10landondonovan @ussoccer #mls #landon #donovan #lagalaxy #galaxy #futbol #soccer #ma #la

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 3, D.C. United 1. Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Alex Caskey with a cross.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Eddie Johnson grazes it into the net for DC

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Lessons from 2014: Eddie Johnson is a super sub, not a starter. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Der Kommisar
timelineItems.text: Are we sure Eddie touched that? #DCU

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Great run from EJ. Whether he touched it or not, he deserves credit for that goal. #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Landon Donovan misses wide open net with volley

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Great little ball from Caskey. Makes things a bit more interesting. Get Espindola in there. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: We're checking the record books for the quickest #LAGalaxy goal ever.

timelineItems.name: Russ Thaler
timelineItems.text: Well, that didn't take long. #LAvDC . Prep for Sunday's #DCvNY and also Friday's #SKCvHOU tonight in KC. @NBCSportsSoccer @NBCSN

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).
Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Alan Gordon with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: EJ wasn't going to leave LA without a fight. DC is now on the board. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Mariel
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan's out here looking like someone's dad in a full tracksuit. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: wнerescastalძo
timelineItems.text: Up here in the nosebleeds #thanksLD #LAndondonovan #lagalaxy @lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: So much for my last tweet. Estrada will return to right midfield with Espindola coming in. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Oh! The highlight cutters were at the ready on that volley. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Sean McPherson
timelineItems.text: Jeffrey is providing a surprising amount of energy. Good sub, Benny. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Taylor Kemp (D.C. United).
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Looks like an own goal from Leonardo rather than an EJ goal. Told you guys Leonardo would give us one. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Ball goes off Leonardo's left foot. Should be an own goal b/c Penedo had it covered, but could be Caskey's since it's heading on goal #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Sean Franklin (D.C. United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eddie Johnson.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Sean Franklin blast forces Penedo into diving stop

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Gordon off. Rogers on. RR to LM, LD to go up top with Zardes, I bet. #LAGalaxy #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Sean Franklin (D.C. United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eddie Johnson.
Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Jaime Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Brian Smith
timelineItems.text: Baggio Husidic is not 100% when passing forward. And #LA needs to work on personal handling/juking defenders. #LAGalaxy #OurCityOurHome

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Leonardo must know where every single body is buried. #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bill Hamid kick save on Zardes for the third time

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: SAN PENEDO! #SANPENEDO http://t.co/qslbYVZzXE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bobby Boswell (D.C. United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jared Jeffrey with a cross.
Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a through ball.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Bill Hamid.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: That foot save might have been better than the first #dcuafterdark #dcu #mls #lag

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Hamid is so good at staying big. That's a RIDICULOUS save on Zardes. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan is now pushed up top with Zardes. Robbie Rogers in at left mid. #LAGalaxy #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) header from very close range is too high. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Panedo may not have realized he saved that deflection until after the ball was clear. #instinct #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Fabian Espindola (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Russ Andolina
timelineItems.text: I was going to say I was shocked EJ laid it off instead of shooting but he's been unselfish all year for DC. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabian Espindola (D.C. United).
Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #LAvDC Scoring Update: They're crediting the Eddie Johnson goal as an own goal for Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Hamid: Not to be outdone. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Espindola comes in and DC United already have more shots in 5 minutes with him on the field than they did in the first 60 minutes. #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lewis Neal (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Mark Rickling
timelineItems.text: When does Parke get back? #DCU needs some competition at center back. #DCUTalk

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Here’s tonight’s super-focused (and handsome) starting XI. #LAvDC match center: http://t.co/xxPaGXXdak  http://t.co/LDaaKk507G

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy seem to have switched to their counter attack gear. And I'm ok with that right now. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Fabian Varela
timelineItems.text: Hump day footy!! #lagalaxy #mlssoccer #galaxy #humpday #wednesday #whatdayisit? #landondonovan #thanksld

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Jaime Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @ACBrigade shouting "Eddie Sucks" at Eddie Johnson. Not the warmest reception for the #DCU forward. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Amanda Goheen
timelineItems.text: Landon has created a lot of chances. Keep it up #LAvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Taylor Kemp (D.C. United).
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Last season #DCU were both bad and unlucky. The record belied the ability. This is less a turnaround and more a karma correction.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Goosebumps. Baggio Husidic buries A.J. DeLaGarza’s cross to score: http://t.co/MsRTzl8ghe #LucaKnowsHeart #LAvDC http://t.co/7d4fasQ5rA

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Nice to see Jeffrey playing well here. Been a rough season for him overall, but he's making a positive impact on this game. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Penedo getting some more work with the flick over the bar. Also, our spell check. #LAvDC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marcelo
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Robbie Rogers denied by strong Bill Hamid footwork

timelineItems.name: Stopani
timelineItems.text: Finally made it out to a match. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Penalty LA Galaxy. Omar Gonzalez draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Omar Gonzalez pushed in the box

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Most coaches looking at LA would not have used EJ until the RBNY match on Sunday. #OslensArmy be damned. He gave him a shot & was wrong #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Bill Hamid.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 4, D.C. United 1. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Landon Donovan makes no mistake from the spot

timelineItems.comment: Penalty LA Galaxy. Omar González draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Bill Hamid's lateral quickness #dcuafterdark #mls #dcu

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: PK because...? Maybe Boswell's grab on Zardes? MLS is tightening up on this, but it seems like a big stretch to me. #DCU

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLL LANDON DONOVAN! 4-1! #LAvDC http://t.co/zUTfjZ0pob

timelineItems.name: Douglas
timelineItems.text: Might have witnessed the worst penalty call I'm soccer history. Of course it happens to #DCU. Not actually joking here either.

timelineItems.comment: Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Stott had to be calling the foul on Boswell, but there just isn't much there at all. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Marisa Alexis
timelineItems.text: Goaaaaaaalllll!!!!!! #LAGalaxy #Futbol #Soccer #PeelReel

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: No doubt when Donovan steps to the spot. #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Very soft call there by Stott, but I've seen Gonzalez absolutely draped and hugged (see Borchers, Nat) and no call was given. So...? #LAvDC

timelineItems.name: Gabriel
timelineItems.text: Landon scores his 141th goal in Major League Soccer!!!!!! #LAGalaxy #DCUnited #LandonDonovan #StubHubCenter

timelineItems.name: Allison Corona
timelineItems.text: That announcement of Donovan's goal was probably the loudest the Stub Hub Center has been this season. #lagalaxy #thanksLD

timelineItems.text: Goooaaalllllll! 4-1 on a penalty shot from @10landondonovan !!!! #lagalaxy #ld #soccer with @crazyflirt3000

timelineItems.name: Luis Alvarez
timelineItems.text: Just a night with the LA boys. Living Legend. Landon. Thank you for everything. #LD #Donovan #USMNT #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.text: Kitchen has been solid for DC this yr. It will be interesting to see how he does in the midfield against the Brazilians. #LAvDC #Possession

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Hope you're enjoying watching LA play tiki-taco -- or hot potato as some of you are adorably calling it ;) #LAvDC Less than 2 min remaining!

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Why did #DCU lose this game? Horrible first half, giveaways throughout. 2nd half was far better, but obviously too little too late.
